In my 20 years working in male-dominated organizations & in leadership roles surrounded by men, I can literally count only ONE male ally. Ever. Only one (amazing) man who stood up for me publicly without being asked. That’s sad guys - do better. We notice! #HRtweets https://t.co/iEafQJV7y2

@Mamaofabean Dude. You JUST looked that up to justify yo judginess. 🙃 IMO believing in his cause doesn’t make her evil or a bad person. For me, those are people I don’t want to friend up. Maybe she’s mad shortsighted lol, but politics don’t define a whole person. I know you know this.
@Mamaofabean Lol. She’s a REPORTER. She reads off a teleprompter. I didn’t hear her voice her personal opinions... did you?

@Mamaofabean Cost of living allowance (COLA) accounting for inflation. I thought your collective agreement provided for at least this? If not, that’s terrible. You’re effectively making LESS money every year that goes by.
@Mamaofabean Don’t you at least get COLA?

@Mamaofabean @emiiilyt You’re unionized though. That system is entirely different. It’s not performance-based. By virtue of being in position long enough you move up the salary grid. Bad side? Explains how incompetent teachers stay in roles too long as well.
@emiiilyt 10? That’s ridiculous. Who designed this crap.
